content: I have a new example for sequence and want to add it to the "build/publish/sequence-examples.html" page, how can I do it?
It seems like there are more than one example in 'build/source/sequence' but only one display in the webpage, I don't know if there's something wrong.
This should probably be on the committer's thread. You have to update the resource spreadsheet to point to its examples for them to show up in the publication
The most broad answer is that there should be a CP that identified your example. This would then get approved by the responsible committee. Then it would get added to the build.
